abstract: The Carlyle Group, the Washington-based private equity firm, said Thursday that Stephen C. Gray had become a senior adviser to the firm’s global telecommunications and media group. Mr. Gray is a telecom entrepreneur and former executive at McLeodUSA and MCI.
